Title: Plumed Serpent
Plot: While investigating an arson-related homicide with Hank, Nick finds himself in the heated world of Portland fire-dancing where he meets a woman who might just be too hot to handle. With Monroe?s help, Nick will have to find out if he can investigate the case without getting himself or those close to him burned.
GuestStars: Danielle Panabaker, Daniel Baldwin, Don Adler, Michael Fetters, Rusty Tennant
